activity.text:

activity.text: Fix UI misalignment in Appointment Details card (#12100)

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12112
activity.text: Fix UI misalignment in Appointment Details card (#12100)

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12100
activity.text:
> [@nihal467](https://github.com/nihal467) [@abhimanyurajeesh](https://github.com/abhimanyurajeesh) [@Jacobjeevan](https://github.com/Jacobjeevan) can you assign me this issue
> 
> SOLUTION :
> 
> * Using  flex items-center gap-x-4 min-w-0 for all field containers.
> * Using  min-w-0 flex-1 and truncate for value wrappers.
> * providing  a fallback for missing data.
> * print/save mode uses the same layout and overflow handling.
> 
> END DATE : TODAY

No need to do all these steps. I've already fixed it locally, so we can do it in a much simpler way.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12053
activity.text: üêõ Fix: Mobile sidebar state issue (#12038)

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12038
activity.text:
@abhimanyurajeesh The current implementation persists the sidebar's "expanded" or "collapsed" state using cookies, and it works correctly on the web screen. However, for mobile, the cookie logic was not implemented. I found a solution that correctly reflects the sidebar's open or closed state based on the current implementation, but the state is not being persisted in the cookie.

This line of code is able to fix the current bug.
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f44d6fab-b005-416e-baff-d1bcab0ec77f)

Here is the video

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f1724c51-2452-46a0-9dbc-7a6e6d5039b5

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12038
activity.text:
The cookie we store in the browser, which controls the open and close state of the sidebar, is not updating on mobile devices when opening and closing the tab. It works correctly on the web screen, and also, the cookie is not being set initially, which is causing this issue.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8b31ca5e-3eca-4ae1-9e1d-23228aa39599)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a98fdf47-3b4a-4b84-92c1-4f9f7df84f40)
